entities.name: dobby
entities.description: Dobby is introduced as a loyal and selfless elf who is making socks for Harry. He is described as being happy and proud of his gift.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as being pleased with the Chudley Cannon hat he received from Harry.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is introduced as having a great friend in Dobby and receiving gifts from him.

entities.name: chudley cannon
entities.description: The Chudley Cannon hat is described as being cool and clashed with Ron's hair.

entities.name: snitches
entities.description: Snitches are mentioned as a pattern on one of the socks Dobby made for Harry.

entities.name: broomsticks
entities.description: Broomsticks are mentioned as a pattern on one of the socks Dobby made for Harry.

relationships.description: Dobby is giving gifts to Harry, including socks he made himself.
Ron received the Chudley Cannon hat from Harry.
